node.excerpt: Tenure track lecturer at Mahidol University Contact: please see contact page Titipat Achakulvisut runs the biomedical and data lab (BioDat lab) at the Department of Biomedical Engineering, Mahidol University, Nakhon Pathom, Thailand. He completed his…
